==Description==
This weakness occurs when the application transmits or stores authentication credentials and uses an insecure method that is susceptible to unauthorized interception and/or retrieval.
==Impact==
==Countermeasures==
Hash and salt passwords: * [[4940a340-62a3-4dc5-8d2d-3b5e3a4dc5b9|Hash And Salt Passwords]]
==Checklists==
Passwords are hashed and salted for storage: * [[29f48335-d577-4962-aac5-61ab7a56297a|Passwords Are Hashed And Salted When Stored]]
==Additional Resources==
* For the CWE page about this vulnerability type, see http://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/522.html
